A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Terrible movie.  The plot holes were glaring\, too many characters were killed off with the remaining ones not having enough depth to replace them\, and it made Luke out to be an emo crybaby and Kylo out to be some goth kid mad at mom and dad.  It was like a movie made for 8-year-olds\, or\, better yet\, to sell as much march as possible to 8-year-olds.
